Topic.Title: The Bad Room - release date confirmed

Posts.EditableText:
Just to let everyone know Carlii Cortez's Quest game entited "The Bad Room" will be released on the [b:172rw8ug]1st of March 2004[/b:172rw8ug].

From the author of "Green Light".
